scripts.allure-report: allure generate ./allure-results -c && npm run clean && npm run copy && allure open
scripts.test: mocha --require esm --require source-map-support/register --require ts-node/register --file __tests__/setUp.js __tests__/*.spec.js --timeout 900000 --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config/mocha-config.json
scripts.device-test: TAIKO_EMULATE_DEVICE='iPhone X' mocha --require esm --require source-map-support/register --require ts-node/register --file __tests__/setUp.js __tests__/*.spec.js --timeout 900000 --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=config/mocha-config.json
